home.title: Rushel & Sivani are getting married
home.welcomeText: We are thrilled to celebrate our special day with our beloved family and friends. Our wedding will be a beautiful blend of Christian and Hindu traditions, reflecting our unique journey and shared love.

christianEvent.title: Christian Ceremony
christianEvent.description: Join us for a beautiful celebration of marriage with traditional Christian customs.

hinduEvent.description: Experience a vibrant Hindu wedding ceremony full of color and tradition.

rsvp.title: Will You Join Us?
rsvp.description: Your presence would mean the world to us. Please let us know if you can celebrate this special day with us by submitting your RSVP.

christian.title: Christian Ceremony
christian.headline: Join Us for Our Christian Wedding Ceremony
christian.description: We are delighted to invite you to our Christian wedding ceremony. This sacred occasion will be a celebration of our love and commitment to each other, guided by Christian traditions and values.
christian.description2: The ceremony will take place in a beautiful church setting, where we will exchange vows and rings before God and our loved ones. We would be honored to have you witness this special moment in our lives.

arrival.description: Please arrive at the church 30 minutes before the ceremony begins.

recessional.description: The newlyweds exit the church, followed by the wedding party.

hindu.title: Hindu Ceremony
hindu.headline: Celebrate Our Hindu Wedding Ceremony
hindu.description: We warmly invite you to our traditional Hindu wedding ceremony. This vibrant celebration will honor ancient customs and rituals that symbolize the sacred union of two souls.
hindu.description2: The ceremony will take place in a beautifully decorated mandap, where we will perform various rituals guided by a Hindu priest. Your presence would make this auspicious occasion even more special.

rituals.description: Our Hindu wedding ceremony will include several meaningful rituals that symbolize our commitment and the joining of our families.

reception.title: Wedding Reception
reception.headline: Celebrate With Us at Our Wedding Reception
reception.description: After our ceremonies, we invite you to join us for an evening of celebration, food, music, and dancing. This will be a wonderful opportunity to come together with family and friends in a relaxed and joyful atmosphere.
reception.description2: The reception will feature a delicious dinner, heartfelt speeches, our first dance as a married couple, and plenty of time to dance the night away. We can't wait to celebrate this special day with all of you!

arrival.title: Guest Arrival
arrival.description: Arrive and get settled. Enjoy welcome drinks as we prepare for the evening.

cocktail.title: Cocktail Hour
cocktail.description: Mingle with other guests and enjoy appetizers and refreshments.

entrance.title: Grand Entrance
entrance.description: The newlyweds make their grand entrance into the reception hall.

dinner.title: Dinner Service
dinner.description: A delicious multi-course meal featuring both Western and Indian cuisine.

speeches.title: Speeches & Toasts
speeches.description: Heartfelt speeches from family and friends, followed by toasts to the newlyweds.

party.title: Dance Party
party.description: The dance floor opens! Let's celebrate with music and dancing until late into the night.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is our favorite. Here's a glimpse into our journey from strangers to soulmates.

met.title: How We Met
met.description: Through our friends Vithursan and Subi, who brought their colleague circles together, our paths crossed for the first time. What started as a casual meeting among colleagues quickly evolved into exciting conversations and a special connection.

firstMeet.title: Our First Meeting
firstMeet.description:
Sivani was looking for someone to motivate her to run and wrote: 'If only I had someone to run with me, I would be much more motivated!'
Rushel didn't quite catch the hint at first and instead suggested various other running partners to her üòÖ.
After several attempts, the hint was finally understood ‚Äì and so we took our first walk together in Eschenbach. For the first time, we did something completely alone ‚Äì and noticed how wonderful it felt.

firstDate.title: How We Got Together
firstDate.description:
On a beautiful day in March, we met at Seerose in Pf√§ffikon for a date. Between conversations, laughter, and the view of the lake, we both realized that we had truly found each other.
On that day, we decided to make it official ‚Äì and two friends became a couple. üíû

families.title: Meeting the Families
families.description:
In July 2024, the time had come ‚Äì we officially introduced ourselves to our parents for the first time.
With a little excitement, but much joy, our families met.
It quickly became clear: They also got along wonderfully ‚Äì and welcomed us both with open arms and warm hearts. ‚ù§Ô∏è

proposal.title: Our Nichayathartham
proposal.description:
In November 2024, we celebrated our Tamil cultural Nichayathartham.
A day full of joy, tradition, family, and love.
With this special moment, a new chapter began for us ‚Äì the path to our life together. üíç‚ú®

engagement.title: The Proposal
engagement.description:
In Nice, with a beautiful view and an unforgettable moment, Rushel got down on one knee before Sivani in July 2025.
With a pounding heart and a smile full of love, he asked the one question that changes everything.
And with her 'Yes,' our forever together began. üíñüåÖüíç

wedding.description:

cultures.title: A Union of Religions
cultures.description1: We are both proud to be of Tamil heritage and share the same beautiful culture. What makes us special is the union of our different faiths ‚Äì Christian and Hindu.
cultures.description2: Our wedding will be a celebration of this religious union, honoring both Christian and Hindu traditions. We invite you to join us in this joyous celebration of love, family, and spiritual harmony.

gifts.title: Wedding Gifts
gifts.description: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we have created a registry for your convenience.

note.title: A Note About Gifts
note.description: We're truly honored that you will be celebrating our special day with us. Your presence is what matters most, and we're grateful for your love and support. If you'd like to give a gift, we hope our registry provides some helpful guidance.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Share in our joy by viewing photos from our special day. After the wedding, this section will be filled with cherished moments from both ceremonies. We also invite you to share your own photos here.

transportationTips.title: Transportation Tips
tips: We recommend renting a car as the venues are in different locations.
Swiss public transportation is excellent but may require multiple connections.
Taxis and ride-sharing services are available but can be expensive for longer distances.
We will arrange shuttle service between key hotels and venues on ceremony days.
